overview: Brought by poverty, Petang and Cereno are driven into the realm of child labor to live by the clock. Film Weekly follows their journey as they step back to breathe and to be children once again.

production_companies.name: Ecumenical Institute for Labor Education and Research (EILER)
Center for Trade Union and Human Rights (CTUHR)
Institute for Occupational Health and Safety Development (IOHSAD)
Rural Missionaries of the Philippines - Northern Mindano Region (RMP-NMR)

title: Playground
